review: Over the years I have found that Refurbished Electronic devices are just as good as what is considered new.  Warranty is the same anyway.  I own 2 other older Roku streaming video devices and really love them for viewing movies and TV series offered by Amazon.  While I have a Panasonic Video player that does streaming video, I find Roku is much more effiecent and easy to switch from TV mode to Streaming video.  And as my TV has extra HDMI ports, I bought this ROKU STICK and it was easy to install and is less cumbersome to connect to the TV.  I get great streaming video, it offers a good number of other options, some of which are You Tube, Pandora, Net Flix, etc.  I plugged the stick in the HDMI port I wanted, attached AC the power adapter as I  heard that's the best way to be sure your ROKU STICK gets sufficient power to operate well.  I plan to buy another for the guest bedroom TV which is not on the cable so guests can enjoy streaming video.  A great product and it has more options that some other streaming video devices.  A great price and I got great delivery service with my prime order for it.
author: Steve
